simplified: 端起碗吃肉，放下筷子骂娘

pronunciation.pinyin: duān qǐ wǎn chī ròu , fàng xià kuài zi mà niáng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: duan1 qi3 wan3 chi1 rou4 , fang4 xia4 kuai4 zi5 ma4 niang2

details.simplified: 端起碗吃肉，放下筷子骂娘
details.traditional: 端起碗吃肉，放下筷子罵娘

meanings.value: lit. to eat meat from one's bowl, then put down one's chopsticks and scold one's mother
fig. to complain despite being privileged
to be ungrateful for what one has been given
